pageContext.content:
I am a professional artist living in Herefordshire, England UK.

The majority of my work is of the Herefordshire landscape, not just the rivers and streams but buildings in villages and towns, capturing the character and style of bygone architecture. Several of my paintings, with timber framed houses and buildings of immense beauty have been produced from old black and white photographs, as the scenes depicted no longer exist.

I have had my paintings exhibited in over sixty venues as well as having prints and cards on permanent display in shops and galleries, and now I am able to offer my work via this website.

featured.description:
An artist paradise. There's a paintable scene around every corner. I've spent many an hour drawing in one of the most popular village harbours in Cornwall.

Original watercolour, image size 13.75" x 10".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

The signed, embossed, limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £40.

featured.description:
The River Fowey can be crossed between Bodinnick and Fowey by a small car ferry, this cuts out a long drive around the esturary. Since 1869 the harbour including the estuary has been managed by the Fowey Harbour Commissioners and more than 7,000 yachts and pleasure craft visit during a typical season.

Original watercolour, image size 14" x 10 ".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

A signed, embossed, limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11".

Price £40.
featured.metaDescription: Watercolour painting of Fowey, Cornwall. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.
featured.paypalEmbedCode: Fowey, Cornwall.
featured.title: Fowey, Cornwall.

featured.description:
The lane between the cathedral and High Town was known as 'Cabochelone' or 'Cabbage ' Lane in the 13th century. In the 15th century the two parts being separated by East Street were known as 'Brode Cabeige Lane' (Church Street) and 'Narowe Cabeige Lane'(Cupuchin Lane).

Original watercolour, image size 14" x 10".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £40
featured.metaDescription: Watercolour Painting of Church Street and Hereford Cathedral. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.
featured.paypalEmbedCode: P803 Church Street & Hereford Cathedral
featured.title: Church Street & Hereford Cathedral

featured.description:
Porthleven is a historic fishing port located to the west of the Lizard Peninsula in Cornwall and was certified as a harbour in 1825. On the night of 12th December 1978 a police patrol car was swept into the harbour during a heavey storm, killing the two police constables inside.

Original watercolour, image size 12" x 10".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £40
featured.metaDescription: Watercolour Painting of Porthleven, Cornwall. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.

featured.title: Porthleven, Cornwall
